name: Generation Omega
description:
Generation Omega is a top-down-arena-based-shooter where you have to upgrade your character over the course of many generations. The amount of upgrades you can get is limited by the amount of enemies you've defeated. But keep in mind that enemies also get stronger the further you get.

This game was made for the Trijam #144 in 3 hours. The theme was "Life line", but I couldn't think of anything other than grappling hooks, which I used in my last game, so I generated a random theme, which ended up being "generations".
